Name: Barbary Coast Highball
Ingredients: 30 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE all but soda with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and stir.
Review: Looks like a glass of frothy weak tea - bourbon and chocolate predominate.
History: Information on Highball cocktails , their history and tips on the perfect serve can be found on our page.
Nutrition: One serving of Barbary Coast Highball contains 290 calories
